pr_title: KOGITO-3126 DMN fix regression on Kogito not highlighted by Jenkins/CI

timeline.message: KOGITO-3126 DMN fix regression on Kogito not highlighted by Jenkins/CI

timeline.bodyText:
Is this if condition necessary? Is this test invoked multiple times (i.e. parameterized)? If not it will always perform one fixed branch.
What am I missing?
timeline.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText: You cannot see it from GitHub I'm afraid, but this test is indeed parametrized, so not all variants are IsTypeSafe. So yes, the IF statement is indeed necessary.
replies.author: tarilabs
